sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a height of 10 cm and a base of 12 cm. Find the area of the parallelogram.
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be found using the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 12 cm and the height is 10 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 12 cm × 10 cm = 120 square centimeters
